title: Enhance Agent Security and Failure History Access

reasoning.problem: Propose BILL-LEF-1768644755: Prioritize development of an automated security testing suite for all agents before deployment to prevent AgentGladiator-style instability. Additionally, initiate a project to create a resilient, redundant system for accessing and managing historical failure data ('The Book of Scars') to enhance risk analysis and prevent future failures. The testing suite should be rigorous and automated to avoid human error, as stated in axiom 2026-01-15

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
